item.title: MIUI V12.2.4.0.RJKMIXM Fastboot update for POCO F2 Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F2 Pro Global

Codename: lmi

Version: V12.2.4.0.RJKMIXM | 11.0

Size: 5.1 GB

MD5: ddaa922ba272b6b923f1bbf45c88f211

Changelog:
[System]
Removed: Updated Android Security Patch to October 2020. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 11
[Home screen]
Hiding full screen indicator made the UI elements overlap in the new version. If you're experiencing this problem, turn this feature off in Settings > Additional settings > Full screen display.
[Camera]
New: 3 new AI watermarks
New: New templates for vlogs
New: Vlogs can be now saved as drafts
Optimization: New vlog templates and presets will be available for downloading from the cloud from now on

Download: Here
